name: Pig-Latin-Translator
description: | Spec                                                           | Input     | Output        | |----------------------------------------------------------------|-----------|---------------| | Ignore non-alphabet characters                                 | 3         | 3             | | Put "ay" at the end of single letter words                     | i         | iay           | | Put "way" at end of multi-letter words that start with a vowel | egg       | eggway        | | Move first consonants of words to the end and add "ay"         | track     | acktray       | | Words with qu take the "u" to the end, too                     | squeal    | ealsquay      | | All of the above for multiple words                            | pig latin | igpay atinlay |
